biotools.summary: CeTF is an R package to Coexpression for Transcription Factors using Regulatory Impact Factors (RIF) and Partial Correlation and Information (PCIT) analysis. The package provides the necessary functions for performing the Partial Correlation coefficient with Information Theory (PCIT) (Reverter and Chan 2008) and Regulatory Impact Factors (RIF) (Reverter et al. 2010) algorithm.
